nodes.text: Beau was a pilot who flew an X-wing fighter in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Their callsign was Red Ten.

In the year 3 ABY, they were stationed onboard the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Liberty after suffering minor injuries from a battle to capture new experimental TIE fighter prototypes, and Ace Azzameen brought them Veromulan candies at the medical bay. They eventually recovered from the injuries and continued active service against the Galactic Empire. A year later, Beau participated in the Battle of Endor and was killed during the firefight against enemy fighters.
